title: BOOOAL's Arms
content:
BOOOAL's Arms Common 1~6 Damage 1d6 Piercing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The cut-off pincer of some Underdark crustacean seems to magically adhere to a bone shaft, creating a make-shift javelin. Javelin Thrown 0.9 10

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The cut-off pincer of some Underdark crustacean seems to magically adhere to a bone shaft, creating a make-shift javelin.

BOOOAL's Arms is one of the Simple Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has
